title: The Bottle Boy
description: The Bottle Boy is a 3D puzzle platformer game where friendship is at the heart of every challenge! You play as a groovy, breakdancing Glass Bottle with a mission: to save Corky the Dog from a looming tsunami. To rescue your best friend, you'll need to fill up with water, solve math and logic puzzles, and dance your way through obstacles across a vibrant, hip-hop-inspired world. Along the way, collect photos to exchange at the HIP STYLE HOP STORE and unlock cool new looks. Get ready for a journey filled with love, puzzles, and endless style!
